summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Daily Activity Report for August 10, 2019. It documents routine operations and, most significantly, notes that inmate Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell during the Day Watch Shift.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate #76318-054 who was found unresponsive in his cell during the Day Watch Shift on August 10, 2019.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein found unresponsive
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was found unresponsive in his cell during the Day Watch Shift at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is a Daily Activity Report for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York dated August 11, 2019, covering activities from August 10, 2019.
It states that inmate Jeffrey Epstein (Inmate #76318-054) was found unresponsive in his cell during the Day Watch Shift.
The report notes operational issues including a vacated sanitation assignment and an inoperative fire panel in the Control Center.
The report lists the total inmate population at the beginning of the Morning Watch Shift on August 10, 2019, as 759.
